metadata.name: Flower With a Bird's Spirit
metadata.description:
Commentary:  
The flower unfurls to reveal its form to the world. Unseen by most there is a blush of colour shown only to the bees. 

A concealed second self. When the eyes of the world are averted, it takes flight in quiet ways.

About this collection: 
Art helps us perceive those mysterious things around us not easily seen. My ancestors believed we are all part of the Great Dream that is dreaming us, where all things are imbued with a spirit that comes from the mind of that which dreams us.

I find this a beguiling idea. It poetically describes a duality between the mundane and the ethereal. A sense of personality that permeates everything from the mountains, streams and forests of the landscape, to the towns, streets, homes, and experiences in our lives.

Everything we perceive about the world has been filtered by our subconscious, overlaying it with meanings and interpretations. This unseen, almost magical way in which we experience reality is what I want to explore in this collection.

Art can be an instrument of self-discovery, for both artist and collector. So come with me and explore the eternal dream, the invisible pantheon, the immutable spirit...

The art of the unseen. 

Artist: Matt Brown  
Year: 2022  
Collection: That Which Dreams Us

Creating this piece:  
This piece was created using a combination of AI tools and digital painting.

Tools:  
Midjourney and Photoshop
